lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Jack, of East Hampton on April 13, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Anita, devoted father of Michael and Karen, dear fatherin-law of Juliann Garey. Adored grandfather of Gabriel and Emmanuelle, caring brother of the late Arthur, cherished uncle and friend. Service Sunday, April 17, 12 noon at "The Riverside," 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in his memory may be made to American Diabetes Association www.diabetes.org or City Harvest www.cityharvest.org 1/3
